text.text_translated:
An earthquake is when the ground shakes a lot.
Earthquakes can break many things.
They can break bridges too.
But bridges do not fall down very often.
This is true for new bridges even more.
Engineers now design bridges for earthquake areas.
They choose strong ground that does not move easily.
